SEARCH
Module LB08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientNetworkObserver
public class ClientController extends Object implements ClientNetworkObserver
This class acts as the central controller for the client-side application of the Codex game.

    • getInstance

      public static ClientController getInstance()
      Singleton pattern implementation to ensure only one instance of `ClientController` exists throughout the application.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance.

    • processMessage

      public void processMessage(org.json.simple.JSONObject message)
      This method is called whenever a message is received from the server. It delegates the message processing to the `ClientMessageHandler`.
      Specified by:
      processMessage in interface ClientNetworkObserver
      Parameters:
      message - message to process.

    • resetModels

      public void resetModels()
      Resets all the client models to their initial state.

    • notifyConnectionLoss

      public void notifyConnectionLoss()
      Updates the client state to reflect the loss and displays a message. Called when a network connection loss is detected.
      Specified by:
      notifyConnectionLoss in interface ClientNetworkObserver

    • sendSetUsernameMessage

      public void sendSetUsernameMessage(String username)
      Sends a message to the server to set the player's username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be set for the player.

    • sendGetAvailableGamesMessage

      public void sendGetAvailableGamesMessage()
      Sends a message to the server requesting a list of available games to join.

    • sendJoinGameMessage

      public void sendJoinGameMessage(String gameName)
      Sends a message to the server requesting to join a specific game.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to join.

    • sendLeaveMessage

      public void sendLeaveMessage()
      Sends a message to the server indicating the client intends to leave the current game session.

    • sendSetUpGameMessage

      public void sendSetUpGameMessage(String gameName, int numOfPlayers)
      Sends a message to the server requesting to set up a new game.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The desired name for the new game.
      numOfPlayers - The desired number of players for the game.

    • sendReadyMessage

      public void sendReadyMessage()
      Sends a message to the server indicating the client is ready to begin the game.

    • sendChosenStarterCardSideMessage

      public void sendChosenStarterCardSideMessage(int cardId, boolean facingUp)
      Sends a message to the server informing the chosen side for a specific starter card identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The unique identifier of the starter card.
      facingUp - Whether the chosen side of the card is facing up.

    • sendChosenSecretObjectiveMessage

      public void sendChosenSecretObjectiveMessage(int cardId)
      Sends a message to the server indicating the chosen secret objective card identified by its ID.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The unique identifier of the chosen secret objective card.

    • sendPlaceMessage

      public void sendPlaceMessage(int cardId, int x, int y, boolean facingUp)
      Sends a message to the server requesting to place a card on the game board.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The unique identifier of the card to be placed.
      x - The X-coordinate of the desired placement location.
      y - The Y-coordinate of the desired placement location.
      facingUp - Whether the card should be placed facing up or down.

    • sendDirectDrawResourceCardMessage

      public void sendDirectDrawResourceCardMessage()
      Sends a message to the server requesting to draw a resource card directly from the resource deck.
